resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "analyzer": {
                "my_custom_analyzer": {
                    "type": "custom",
                    "tokenizer": "standard",
                    "char_filter": [
                        "html_strip"
                    ],
                    "filter": [
                        "lowercase",
                        "asciifolding"
                    ]
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.indices.analyze(
    index="my-index-000001",
    analyzer="my_custom_analyzer",
    text="Is this déjà vu</b>?",
)
print(resp1)
